ComicInfo.Title: Fit the Eighth: The Frumious Bandersnatch
ComicInfo.Summary: Harvey Award winner Roger Langridge (The Muppet Show, Thor: The Mighty Avenger) brings you the latest chapter of his critically acclaimed series Snarked! Back on the decks of the good ship Snarkhunter, the Walrus is inconsolable, stricken with a broken heart. But unless Scarlett, Rusty, and McDunk are able to shake him out of his funk, they'll all be stricken with a broken everything as the ship is attacked by a menacing sea beast known only as the frumious Bandersnatch!
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-11-25 22:20:32. [CVDB337727]
ComicInfo.Characters: Banker, Barrister, Beaver, Bellman, Billiard Marker, Bonnet Maker, Broker of Goods, Butcher, Cheshire Cat, Clyde McDunk, Gryphon, Prince Rusty, Queen Scarlet, Wilburforce J. Walrus
